entities.name: beauxbatons students
entities.description: The group of students from Beauxbatons Academy who are participating in the tournament.

entities.name: age line
entities.description: A boundary that separates the participants from the rest of the crowd.

entities.name: parchment slips
entities.description: The documents containing the names of the students participating in the tournament.

entities.name: blue-white flames
entities.description: The fire that is used to burn the parchment slips and reveal the names.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is participating in the tournament.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story who is participating in the tournament.

entities.name: ve ela-girl
entities.description: A female student from Beauxbatons Academy who is participating in the tournament.

entities.name: goblet of fire
entities.description: The equipment used to hold the parchment slips and reveal the names.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: A teacher from Beauxbatons Academy who is staying to judge the tournament.

relationships.description: The Beauxbatons students stepped across the Age Line.
The ve ela-girl dropped her parchment into the Goblet of Fire.
Ron muttered to Harry as they watched the tournament.
Madame Maxime is staying to judge the tournament.
